statuAAR 0.0.0.9000

Package index

Basic functions

getFormulaDataframe()
Returns a data.frame containing formula informations.
getFormulaMeasures()
Returns the measures for the formula abbreviation
getStature()
Returns a list with data.frames with stature estimations.
getStatureDataframe()
Returns the list of stature estimates from getStature() as data.frame.

Formulas

breitinger_bach_1965()
Calculate stature estimation according to Breitinger 1938 & Bach 1965.
byers_etal_1989()
Calculate stature estimation according to: Byers et al 1989.
feldesman_etal_1990()
Calculate stature estimation according to: Feldesman et al 1990.
formicola_franceschi_1996()
Calculate stature estimation based on bone measures according to: Formicola & Franceschi 1996.
maijanen_niskanen_2009()
Calculate stature estimation according to: Maijanen, Niskanen 2009
olivier_etal_1978()
Calculate stature estimation according to: Olivier et al 1978.
pearson_1899()
Calculate stature estimation according to: Pearson 1899
raxter_etal_2008()
Calculate stature estimation according to: Raxter el al 2008.
ruff_etal_2012_a()
Calculate stature estimation according to: Ruff el al 2012, All (indet).
ruff_etal_2012_n()
Calculate stature estimation according to: Ruff el al 2012, North.
ruff_etal_2012_s()
Calculate stature estimation according to: Ruff el al 2012, South.
sjovold_1990()
Calculate stature estimation according to: Sjøvold 1990.
telkkae_1950()
Calculate stature estimation according to: Telkkã 1950.
trotter_gleser_1952_an()
Calculate stature estimation according to: Trotter & Gleser 'American Negro'.
trotter_gleser_1952_aw()
Calculate stature estimation according to: Trotter & Gleser 'American White'.
vercellotti_etal_2009()
Calculate stature estimation according to: Vercellotti et al. 2009

Helper functions

getFormulaNames()
Returns the long names of the formula abbreviation
measures.concordance
measures.concordance: concordance for user measure names to list of valid measures according to Martin (1928)
measures.concordance.rollet1888
measures.concordance.rollet: concordance for Rollet (1888) measure names to list of valid measures according to Martin (1928)
create.measures.concordance() measures.statistics() prep.statuaar.data()
statuAAR data preparation and check functions
statuaar_formula
statuaar_formula: List of implemented formula for stature estimation

Bach1965: statuaar table example

Feldesman1990: statuaar table example

Rollet1888: statuaar table example
dl.rollet1888
dl.rollet1888: statuaar data table
TrotterGleser1952
TrotterGleser1952: statuaar table example
dl.trotter.gleser
dl.trotter.gleser: statuaar data table
